meanings.definition: A type of bird found in tropical forests.
meanings.sent1: Cotingas are colorful birds that live in warm, lush forests.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of cotingas flying gracefully through the trees.
meanings.sent3: The cotingas in the forest were having a chirping competition.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was like a chorus of cotingas in the early morning.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant plumage of the cotingas made them stand out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'cotinga'.
meanings.sent1: We saw a flock of cotingas perched on the branches.
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the cotingas in the treetops.
meanings.sent3: The cotingas on the tree seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with a rainbow of cotingas, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The forest echoed with the calls of the cotingas, creating a symphony of sounds.
